solution.text:
No. of cards marked with a number that is even \(=_{{(2*j)/2}}_\)
Total number of cards \(=_{{(2*j)+1}}_\)
Probability that the number on the card is an even number\(=\frac{_{j}_}{_{{(2*j)+1}}_}=_{{Fraction(j,(2*j)+1)}}_\)

content.text: One card is drawn at random, what is the probability that the number on the card is an even number?
